citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:25 pm on
10-Apr-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 2:25 pm and knocked on the door. The inspector then called the phone
numbers, left a message, waited 30 minutes and left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:25 pm on
10-Apr-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 2:25 pm and knocked on the door.  The inspector then called the phone
numbers, left a message, waited 30 minutes and  left the facility.
